io.netty.buffer

Interface Buf

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReferenceCounted
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ByteBuf, CompositeByteBuf, MessageBuf<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractByteBuf, AbstractDerivedByteBuf, AbstractMessageBuf, AbstractReferenceCountedByteBuf, DefaultCompositeByteBuf, DuplicatedByteBuf, EmptyByteBuf, FilteredMessageBuf, ReadOnlyByteBuf, SlicedByteBuf, SwappedByteBuf

    public interface Buf
extends ReferenceCounted
    A buffer to operate on

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isReadable()
      Returns true if and only if this buffer contains at least one readable element.
      boolean isReadable(int size)
      Returns true if and only if this buffer contains equal to or more than the specified number of elements.
      boolean isWritable()
      Returns true if and only if this buffer has enough room to allow writing one element.
      boolean isWritable(int size)
      Returns true if and only if this buffer has enough room to allow writing the specified number of elements.
      int maxCapacity()
      Returns the maximum allowed capacity of this buffer.
      Buf retain()
      Increases the reference count by 1.
      Buf retain(int increment)
      Increases the reference count by the specified increment.
      BufType type()
      The BufType which will be handled by the Buf implementation

      • Methods inherited from interface io.netty.buffer.ReferenceCounted

        refCnt, release, release
